name: @kogito-tooling/feel-input-component
description: FEEL (Friendly Enough Expression Language) input component (with code-completion/highlight support)

scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && yarn copy:css && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:watch: rimraf dist && yarn copy:css && tsc -p tsconfig.json --watch
scripts.quality-checks: yarn run type-check && yarn run lint && yarn run test
